title: Handouts + Manuals
cleaned_text: These resources were created to run our projects and free clinics. May they be as helpful to you as they have been to us. If you find this information useful, you might also be interested in these other sections of our website: Scrolling Resources Menu Manuals + Guides Herb Cart Service Manual C.E. (Current Edition) [Open Manual](https://drive.google.com/file/d/1NJHpURAdjv4km_v8nllGczDniSko7G8r/view?usp=sharing) [About this document](#) This is the first "Post-Covid" edition and reflects the changes we made so we could continue to serve our community safely and to the best of our abilities. We've also added several new sections on legalities, money matters, and all that jazz. I wrote this manual with the greater community of herbalists in mind, in hopes that it helps folks get projects of their own out there and on the road! The Herb Cart project has grown so much since her maiden voyage back in 2015. I am deeply honored to have had the chance to dream this project into being and grateful for all of the hands and hearts who nurtured her along the way! Next year marks a wonderful new chapter for the Herb Cart as she rolls on under the stewardship of [Marie-Lies Van Asten of Fleur + Forage](https://fleurandforage.com/). Viva la Herb Cart! Herb Cart Service Manual B.C. (Before Corona) [Open Manual](https://drive.google.com/file/d/1XqtRdAJ3TuS6Qx-odIoKi4VL4is9GLN1/view?usp=sharing) [About this document](#) Harriet Bus Guide: Creating a Self-Care Manual [Open document](#) Making HerbCare Packages Guide [Open Guide](https://drive.google.com/file/d/1QIhQD2Efv9mC66xSxxOTu9xrS9VbPrlq/view?usp=sharing) Herbal medicine can truly be a medicine by and for the people! Now more than ever we need to roll up our sleeves and provide herbal support in our communities! Videos Welcome to the Herb Bus A webinar we did for the American Herbalists Guild a few years ago. Herbalista Health Network A lovely video showing little bits and bobs about our programming. (Thank you Abbe and Corinne!) Clinical Forms Herbalista Initial Intake Herbalista Health [Open In Google Docs](https://drive.google.com/file/d/0B-qSgmA565haT0RwckpWenl0bk0/view?usp=sharing&resourcekey=0-A_6h2SzJt8I7CZ4hvVF9-w) [About this document](#) Herb Cart Log Sheet [Open In Docs](https://drive.google.com/file/d/1sbnKYTZDfODY5DNE2OgwXRI51qyjj52b/view?usp=sharing) Herbalista Dispensary Form [Open In [About Google Docs](https://drive.google.com/file/d/0B-qSgmA565haU3NPV3ZVYlZPcUk/view?usp=sharing&resourcekey=0-sBG2iYn3-S9YpZyEEkl_cA) [About this document](#) Pre and Post Operative Support [Open In Google Docs](https://drive.google.com/file/d/0B-qSgmA565haS0FXZzlFblY5MVE/view?usp=sharing&resourcekey=0-Ke_YteXPoN0d-Ip_rbOvWw) [About this document](#) Taking your Herbs [Open In Google Daily Routine [Open In Google Docs](https://herbalista.org/wp-content/uploads/2016/02/Daily-Routine-1.pdf) [About this document](#) Grow a Row Documents For Documents related to the Grow a Row Program, please visit our Grow a Row Page [Visit the Grow a Row Page](https://herbalista.org/projects/grow-a-row-2/) Wildcrafting Brounstein's webpage](https://botanicalstudies.net/wildcrafting/wildcrafting-for-beginners/)for detailed discussion as well as a useful wildcrafting checklist. Do not pick protected, in danger, or at-risk plants. To learn more about this, please visit the [United Plant Savers Species At-Risk Page](https://www.unitedplantsavers.org/species-at-risk). First Aid First Aid Basics [Open In Google Docs](https://drive.google.com/file/d/15orV7fFH4zK9phM1xB8F130hAOws8vBJ/view?usp=sharing) [About this document](#) First Aid Station Hand Sanitizer Recipes [Open PDF](https://drive.google.com/file/d/14RLzlOGEqbgOBDEA1HWOsu8ss1b4rjMP/view?usp=sharing) [hand sanitizer formulas recommended by the World Health Organization](https://www.who.int/gpsc/5may/Guide_to_Local_Production.pdf). Their version calls for the following proportions: Ethanol (84%); 3% Hydrogen Peroxide (4%); Glycerin (1%); and Water (11%). We have respected this ratio with a couple edits- in particular utilizing optional hydrosol for our Water Portion and the addition of Lavender and Tea Tree essential oils for their added anti-microbial potential and incredible aroma. Sharps Injury Protocol [Open In Google Docs](https://docs.google.com/document/d/1YjOFuuYPE0NJn0PaXzyzkCFh2oiEkZnGXDCIDCmyVBA/edit?usp=sharing) [About this document](#) Sharps Safety In [About this Street [Go Medic](https://herbalista.org/resources/links/#street) [About this document](#) Foot Care Harriet Foot Care Clinic Manual [Open PDF](https://drive.google.com/file/d/0B-qSgmA565hadE1zMmxFYnY0cFE/view?usp=sharing&resourcekey=0-G0G6_pJKCMywMKym9xcyig) [About this document](#) Basic Herbal Foot Care [Open PDF](https://drive.google.com/file/d/0B-qSgmA565habVNCMmlMZWZ0Qzg/view?usp=sharing&resourcekey=0-lB3Q2YE7mQd1942MDaX64g) Herbal Foot Care for Hardworking Feet Powerpoint Presentation PDF [Open Powerpoint PDF](https://drive.google.com/file/d/0B-qSgmA565haenplZ2w0RmsxWkE/view?usp=sharing&resourcekey=0-KNESIzST0w_u93CfmYCyIQ) [About Docs](https://drive.google.com/file/d/0B-qSgmA565haNDdyeEQ5cHl0SVU/view?usp=sharing&resourcekey=0-f7WWL00liTjnXZ2EmUXZKw) [About this document](#) Sharps In [About this document](#) Herbalista Intensive Class Handouts "Official" Herbal [Open In Google Docs](https://drive.google.com/file/d/0B-qSgmA565haeHZFMmEzUTBxN2c/view?usp=sharing&resourcekey=0-qeKBp0WA5CCGO7z0i7VnOw) Herbal
